title: Only worked on the 1st day
text:
Now it gets stuck only after opening…
Are you going to fix this anytime soon?

title: App for BeeWi Smart WiFi Plug
text:
It took me barely 5 minutes to realize how great the combination of this “App” and the “BeeWi Smart WiFi Plug” is.

Please provide 
- short 30 second videos on YouTube for how to do specific things.  
- website in English also 
These two things should get this “App” and the “BeeWi Smart WiFi Plug” lots of 5 star ratings.

Thank you,
Neeraj S.

title: Update please
text: Will app support iOS 10 and HomeKit app ?
